Detailed Description

The pthreads implementation of a mutex.

Implements a pthread mutex and wraps the outcome

Member Function Documentation

pthread_mutex_t & sys::MutexInterface< pthread_mutex_t >::getNative (  )  [inline, inherited]

Returns the native type. You probably should not use this unless you have specific constraints on which package you use Use of this function may defeat the purpose of these classes: to provide thread implementation in an abstract interface.

Definition at line 83 of file MutexInterface.h.
